ComicInfo.Summary:
Calie has her old life back. Everything is normal again, including her mom and dad. The perfect life she always dreamed of is actually real. As Calie pinches herself to make sure everything she isn't dreaming she realizes that she can have everything she ever wanted. But she isn't quite convinced of her surroundings as she gets a visit from Grandpa and is forced to make a decision that will change everything.
With limited edition e-bas covers (colored & sketch variant) from Fantastic Realm.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-10-01 19:24:29. [CVDB196762]
